content.description: Squat start with the left hand on the sloping pinch used for the right hand of "Slugs and Ditches". Grab a right hand incut down and right, and then wriggle in a handheel match or toe down on a small notch slightly lower. Crank and smack the crystally sloping lip of the boulder. Stay tight, match the lip and traverse leftwards a few moves and execute the tricky full-body topout.
content.location: This problem is on the right side of the boulder and starts under the small roof.

content.description: Squat start with a left-hand sidepull undercling found on the roof and a sloping pinch for the right. Set a precise heel before pulling on, and then execute a tension move in order to gain the sloping lip of the boulder. A few smacks and possibly a foot-cut allow the climber to gain access to the grovel topout.
content.location: This boulder problem is found on the right side of the boulder. It lies at the entrance of the corridor that leads to the Steve Miller Boulder.

content.description: Sit start matched with both hands on a sloping rail at the lip of the roof. Pull on and campus up to some good slopers before executing a hard lock-off mantle to a jug.
content.location: This problem is the roof section that faces the "Outhouse Boulder".

pathTokens: Boulders Behind the Main Parking Lot/Visitor Center

content.description: This is a fairly small boulder that has a very steep roof. There are only a handful of problems on it, but they pack a serious punch!
